name: Giveaways
description: Host Giveaways for your server with features and requirements!
end_user_data_statement: This cog will store your servers giveaways
install_msg: Check out `[p]gset` to set your settings. Make sure to use `[p]gset manager add [role]` to set a role so you don't come complaining that giveaways broke
author: Andy
